title: Differential amount for the purpose of clause (ii) and (iii) shall be equal to difference in the Annual Statement of Rates (ASR) valuation in the year of transfer and the original consideration paid for the allotment of a Tenement brought forward to the year of transfer through capital inflation index
clause_text: Differential amount for the purpose of clause (ii) and (iii) shall be equal to difference in the Annual Statement of Rates (ASR) valuation in the year of transfer and the original consideration paid for the allotment of a Tenement brought forward to the year of transfer through capital inflation index.
section: Process of Allotment to Beneficiaries and Conditions thereof :-
